Description: Replace header-trust actor context with signed claims validation and enforce claim-bound role plus account/site scoping.
AcceptanceCriteria: Dev headers disabled in production mode; forged/invalid claim tests pass; scope checks enforced on ticket operations.

Item: MVP-04: Signature and evidence reference hardening
Description: Enforce signature-or-explicit-no-signature-reason and validate evidence references are object-store resolvable before completion/verification.
AcceptanceCriteria: Fail-closed tests cover missing signature reason and invalid evidence references on complete/verify paths.

Item: MVP-05: CI blocking gates for dispatch suite
Description: Make dispatch migration tests story suite and canonical E2E blocking in CI with one-command local parity check.
AcceptanceCriteria: CI fails on any dispatch regression and release checklist references deterministic command outputs.

Item: MVP-06: Durable observability and runbook readiness
Description: Wire durable log and metrics sinks with alerts and publish/validate runbooks for key failure modes.
AcceptanceCriteria: On-call drill passes for stuck scheduling

Item: MVP-07: Dispatcher cockpit and technician packet implementation
Description: Implement interactive dispatcher and technician workflows strictly backed by dispatch-api command endpoints.
AcceptanceCriteria: UI actions map only to closed dispatch commands and show fail-closed policy errors with role restrictions.

Item: MVP-08: Pilot UAT and cutover readiness
Description: Execute ops SME UAT rollback rehearsal and release-candidate freeze for pilot cutover.
AcceptanceCriteria: UAT signoff and production cutover checklist completed with rollback plan validated.
